data.name: Adjustable Width Channel Pane
data.description:
Allows you to resize the channel pane to maximize the chat message-area as you see fit.

There is currently no minimum or maximum width set on the column, so you can go as far in either direction as your browser allows [subject to change] - please be careful with this, and simply refresh to load defaults if you have any issues.

Also removed some horizontal padding present on the channel names themselves, and moved the voicechat participants over a bit to retain better functionality while using a very narrow channel pane.

Designed to be compatible with my other modular Discord stylesheets, and will ultimately be included in a "compact Discord" style once I've 'dealt with' each section of the default Discord window.

data.name: IrxnCrow Theme {NOT YOURS}
data.description: Sorry if you want this, how did you find it anyways?

data.name: MDN Editor (UI Tweaks)
data.description: tweaks for the UI of the MDN Editor. * the left panel with the `Source` and `Hide` buttons is changed to position sticky to prevent sliding above * the comment section is changed to be more compact and position absolute thus you could fill it while you edit the article * so the useful things are always at hand * source area settings: background color, font color, font family, font size * use the settings menu to change the colors and other on your choice use MDN Editor (Gray Toolbox) if you want to change color of the panels

data.name: Delete- roblox
Night Sky (V3) - For Edgenuity
data.description:
A pretty night sky theme for Edgenuity. Gradient top menu, pretty background. 

A clean looking edit to Edgenuity. Easy to customize if you know a little CSS, or ask me and I'll make you a custom Edgenuity theme for $1.

user.name: DerangedWifi
user.about:
I make themes for Edgenuity, an online school program.
Working multiple hours a day starring at the dull, lackluster Edgenuity work space got on my nerves, so I started making fresh, custom designs on the page.


Coming Soon - Edgenuity with smart embeds like Youtube + Google docs, to multitask all in one tab!.
